channel.title: Homes on MeelGroup
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on MeelGroup

item.description: Meel Group Welcome to the Meel Group’s web page. We are situated at National University of Singapore.

item.title: News
item.description: 20 June 2018 I will be at IJCAI from July 12 â€“ July 19 and at Leiden University on July 20. I will be co-presenting tutorial with Supratik Chakraborty at IJCAI on July 13. # -- 24 September 2018 Our paper on uniform sampling based on knowledge compilation is accepted at LPAR-22. Authors: Shubham Sharma, Rahul Gupta, Subhajit Roy, and Kuldeep S. Meel 29 August 2018 Kuldeep's PhD thesis was awarded Honorable mention for ACP (Association of Constraint Programming) Doctoral Dissertation award at its annual conference CP 2018.

item.title: People
Contact
item.description: Kuldeep S. Meel Assistant Professor Computer Science Department, School of Computing National University of Singapore Please consult Kuldeep’s calendar before suggesting a meeting time.

item.title: Openings
item.description: We are looking for highly motivated Ph.D. students, postdocs, and interns (with time commitment of at least 6 months) in our group.Two post-doc positions available in the broad area of applying machine learning to SAT solvers, approximate counting techniques, and CP. Details If you are a student at NUS, feel free to drop by Kuldeep’s office or schedule a meeting with him. (See his calendar). Otherwise, please send him an email with your CV if you are interested.
